ModMetaData.name: Combat Realism
ModMetaData.author: NoImageAvailable
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.6.9.5 update by Skyarkhangel, Killface, Mrofa, Spoonshortage, duncanburke, Thorbane for A15-A16
An extensive overhaul of the game's combat to make it more realistic. It doesn't Require Community Core Library version.
